phrases: Water.
Earth.
Fire.
Air.
Long ago, the four nations lived together in harmony.
Then, everything changed when the Fire Nation attacked.
Only the Avatar, master of all four elements, could stop them.
But when the world needed him most, he vanished.
A hundred years passed, and my brother and I discovered the new Avatar...
And although his airbending skills are great.
He has a lot to learn before he is ready to save anyone.
But I believe Aang can save the world.
Look!
He is taunting us.
You are so going to be dinner!
Hey!
Where is the fishing line?
Oh, I did not think you would need it, Sokka.
Aahh, it is all tangled!
Not tangled... woven.
I made you a necklace, Katara.
I thought since you lost your other one...
Thanks,
Aang.
I love it.
Great, Aang.
Maybe instead of saving the world you can go into the jewelry making business.
I do not see why I cannot do both.
Stop taunting me!
So, how do I look?
You mean all of you or just your neck?
I mean, uh, both look great.
Smoochie, smoochie, someone is in love.
Stop teasing him, Sokka.
Aang's just a good friend.
A sweet little guy... just like Momo.
Thanks.
Someone is being attacked by a platypus bear!
Well, hello there.
Nice day, is not it?
Make noise, it will run off!
No, play dead, he will lose interest!
Whoa!
Close one.
Run down hill, then climb a tree!
No, punch him in the bill!
And then run in zigzags!
No need.
It is going to be fine.
Whoa there!
Mmm!
Lunch!
Lucky for you we came along.
Thanks, but everything was already under control.
Not to worry, Aunt Wu predicted I would have a safe journey.
Aunt who?
No, Aunt Wu.
She is the fortuneteller from my village.
Awful nice knowing your future.
Wow, it must be.
That explains why you were so calm.
But the fortuneteller was wrong!
You did not have a safe journey, you were almost killed!
But I was not.
All right, have a good one!
Oh, and Aunt Wu said if I met any travelers to give them this.
Maybe we should go see Aunt Wu and learn our fortunes.
It could be fun.
Oh come on, fortunetelling is nonsense.
What do ya know, an umbrella!
That proves it.
No it does not... you cannot really tell the future.
I guess you are not really getting wet then.
Of course she predicted it was going to rain.
The sky's been gray all day.
Just admit you might be wrong and you can come under the umbrella.
Look, I am going to predict the future now...
It is going to keep drizzling.
See!
Not everyone has the gift, Sokka.
Aunt Wu is expecting you.
Really?
My name is Meng and I am Aunt Wu's assistant.
Well hello there.
Hello.
Can I get you some tea, or some of Aunt Wu's special bean curd puffs?
I will try a curd puff.
Just a second.
So what is your name?
Aang.
That rhymes with Meng!
And you have got some pretty big ears, do not you?
Oh, do not be modest.
They are huge!
Well Aang, it is very nice to meet you.
Very nice.
Likewise.
I cannot believe we are here in the house of nonsense.
Try to keep an open mind, Sokka.
There are things in this world that just cannot be explained.
Would not it be nice to have some insight into your future?
It would be nice to have some bean curd puffs.
Oh Meng!
Aunt Wu says I am going to meet my true love!
He is going to give me a rare panda lilly.
That is so romantic.
I wonder if my true love will give me a rare flower.
Good luck with that!
Is that the big eared guy who Aunt Wu predicted you would marry?
Enjoy your snack.
I guess that is me.
Not bad.
Not bad.
I am good on puffs.
So... what do you think they are talking about back there?
Boring stuff, I am sure.
Love.
Who she is going to marry.
How many babies she is going to have.
Yeh... dumb stuff like that... well, I have got to find a bathroom!
Your palms are so smooth... do you use moisturizer?
Actually, I have this special seaweed lotion.
I could get you some if you want.
So, do you see anything interesting in my love line?
I feel great romance for you.
The man you are going to marry...
Tell me more!
I can see that he is a very powerful bender.
Looks like someone had a pretty good bathroom break.
Yeh, when I was in there...
I do not even want to know!
Who is next?
Okay, let us get this over with.
Your future is full of struggle and anguish, most of it self-inflicted.
But, you did not read my palms or anything!
I do not need to... it is written all over your face.
You then, come with me.
This is the most reliable method of telling your fortune.
The bones never lie.
Go on, pick one.
Now throw it on the fire.
The heat makes cracks in the bones and I read the bone cracks to tell your destiny.
Wow, that is a big crack.
I have never seen this before.
Oh my!
The old destiny, this is incredible!
You will be involved in a great battle,...
Yeh, yeh, I knew that already, but did it say anything about a girl?
A girl?
You want to know about love?
Yes!
I am sorry, but I did not see anything.
Oh look!
I must have missed something.
Right here... it says, trust your heart and you will be with the one you love.
Really!?
Thank you, Aunt Wu!
Well, now you got to see for yourselves that fortunetelling is just a big, stupid hoax.
You are just saying that because you are going to make yourself unhappy your whole life.
That woman is crazy!
My life will be calm, and happy and joyful!
That does not prove anything!
Well, I liked my predictions.
Certain things are going to turn out very well.
They sure are.
Why, what did she tell you?
Some stuff.
You will find out.
What is with the sky?
We are waiting for Aunt Wu to come and read the clouds...
That cloud looks like a fluffy bunny.
You better hope that is not a bunny...
Do you even hear yourself?
The cloud reading will tell us if Mount Makapu...
We used to have a tradition once a year of going up the mountain...
I cannot believe you would trust your lives to that crazy old woman's superstition.
Shhh!!
She is coming!
Hey Aang, does not that cloud look like a flower?
Huh?
Sure, I guess.
Hey Katara, do not you think that cloud looks like a flower?
Shh!!
Bending arrow cloud... good crops this year, nice big harvest!
Arg!
Good news!
Wavy moon shape cloud... let us see?
going to be a great year for twins.
Yes!
And a cumulus cloud with a twisted nob coming off the end of it...
Since I got you here, uh, there is something I want to tell you.
I like you, but more than normal.
Never mind.
Hi, Aunt Wu. Sorry to bother you.
Anytime.
About this man I am supposed to marry...
Ahh, you want another reading.
Yes, please!
I cannot believe all these saps.
Someone really needs to scream some sense at them.
They seem happy, Sokka.
Not for long.
I am going to prove Aunt Wu's predictions are nonsense.
Hey, you.
I bet Aunt Wu told you to wear those red shoes, did not she?
Yeh, she said I would be wearing red shoes when I met my true love.
Uh-huh.
And how many times have you worn those shoes since you got that fortune?
Everyday.
Then of course it is going to come true!
Really?
You think so?
I am so excited!
Wow, thanks Aunt Wu.
Oh, wait, one more thing.
How warmly should I dress tomorrow?
You want me to do a reading for that?
I do not care what Aunt Wu told you, you have to take a bath sometime!
So, Sokka, you know some stuff about ladies, right?
Some stuff?
You have come to the right place.
What can I do you for?
Well, there is this girl...
I think I know who you mean.
You do?
And you are ok with it?
Of course I am.
And, to tell you the truth,...
She does!?
Oh yeh, she is crazy about ya.
All ya have to do now is not mess it up.
Well, how do I do that?
The number one mistake nice guys like you make being too nice.
You can be too nice?
Yup.
If you want to keep her interested you have to act aloof,...
Well... okay.
Hey Aang, I was wondering...
See ya later.
Wow, that kid is good.
Okay, okay, but, one more thing.
All right, what is it?
Should I eat a mango or a papaya for breakfast tomorrow?
Papaya!
Ohhh, I hate papaya.
Oh, hey Katara.
I did not see you there.
Hey Aang.
That is ok, I am busy with my own stuff.
Ugh.
Papaya please.
So... papaya.
Uh-huh.
Would you like some?
You know me.
I do not really care what I eat.
Ok then.
See you later.
Maybe aloof is not my style.
Oh!
A panda lilly!
Did you see that?
Excuse me.
Where can a guy find one of those things?
I cannot believe you are dragging me all the way up here for a stupid flower.
Not just any flower... a panda lilly.
I have seen it in action and boy does it work.
Flowers are fine once you are married,...
But my heart is telling me to get this flower,...
What?
Do not tell me you believe in that stuff too.
Well, Aunt Wu has not been wrong yet.
Why should she be wrong about love?*
There, on the rim!
Oh no!
Aunt Wu was wrong.
Those people all think they are safe.
We have got to warn'them.
There is no time to walk.
Grab on.
Hi, Katara.
Can you believe she will not let me in?
And after all the business I have given her?
But, she does not even charge.
I know, but still.
Well, we have other things to worry about.
Aunt Wu was wrong about the volcano.
Sokka, you tried to convince me she was wrong before.
It is going to take an awful lot to change my min...
Oh, no!
Everyone!
That volcano is going to blow any second.
Aunt Wu was wrong!
Yeh, yeh, we know you do not believe in Aunt Wu, Mr. Science and Reason Lover.
If you will not listen to him, maybe you will listen to me.
I want to believe Aunt Wu and her predictions as much as you do,...
Well I heard Aunt Wu's prediction with my own ears.
Please listen to us!
You are all in danger!
And we have to get out of here.
You cannot rely on Aunt Wu's prediction.
You have to take fate into your own hands.
Look!
Can your fortunetelling explain that?
Can your science explain why it rains?
Yes!
Yes, it can!
They just will not listen to reason.
But they will listen to Aunt Wu.
I know, that is the problem.
Well, it is about to become the solution.
We are taking fate in our own hands.
First, I need to borrow Aunt Wu's cloud reading book.
Shh... we do not want anyone to hear us.
Oh, oh!
I did not see you there.
You do not like me.
Do you?
Of course I like you.
But not the way I like you.
Oh.
I guess not.
It is ok.
It is just really hard when you like someone,...
I know what you mean.
She is beautiful, by the way.
Huh?
That water tribe girl.
I can see why you like her so much.
She is sweet, she is a bender, and her hair seems so manageable.
Do not worry.
You are going to meet a great guy who is going to completely fall for you.
I know it.
Thanks.
Wait!
Do not you want this?
How did you know?
I have kind of been stalking you... heh!
Oh, thanks.
I... I guess.
Clouds are made of water and air so between the two of us...
I found it.
The symbol for volcanic doom.
Aunt Wu, look!
Something is happening in the clouds.
That is very strange.
It should not...
Oh my!
We can still save the village if we act fast.
Sokka has a plan.
Lava is going to flow downhill to this spot.
If we can dig a deep enough trench...
If any of you are earthbenders come with me.
I am an earthbender!
I am not!
Everybody else grab a shovel... come on, we have got to hurry!
Dig faster!
Dig faster!
Everyone needs to evacuate!
We will come for you when it is safe!
It is too much!
It is going to overflow!
Man, sometimes I forget what powerful bender that kid is.
Wait, what did you just say?
Nothing, just that Aang is one powerful bender.
I suppose he is...
By the way, we kind of borrowed your book.
So you messed with the clouds did you!
Very clever!
No offense, but I hope this taught everyone a lesson...
But Aunt
Wu predicted the village would not be destroyed, and it was not.
She was right, after all.
I hate you.
It is ok, Sokka.
Everything's going to be all right.
Can I ask you something?
Of course, honey.
You did not really see love in my fortune, did you?
You just told me what I wanted to hear.
I will tell you a little secret, young Airbender.
Just as you reshaped those clouds,...
Goodbye everyone!
It was so nice to meet you!
Take care, Meng.
Take care!
Floozy.
